🚀 Revolutionary AI-Enhanced Learning

Te Kete Ako

World's first culturally-grounded AI educational platform, transforming indigenous learning through advanced technology and authentic Te Ao Māori integration.

"Whaowhia te kete mātauranga"

Fill the basket of knowledge

✨ Start Learning Journey 🤖 Explore AI Features
467+ Educational Resources
8 AI Functions
100% NZ Curriculum Aligned
🌿 Culturally Authentic

Revolutionary AI Capabilities

Powered by DeepSeek AI, Supabase GraphRAG, and cutting-edge educational technology

🧠

Intelligent Knowledge Graph

Advanced GraphRAG system with 467+ interconnected educational resources, enabling semantic search and intelligent content discovery.

⚡

Adaptive Learning Engine

AI-powered personalized learning pathways that adapt to individual student needs and cultural contexts.

🌿

Cultural Authenticity AI

Specialized AI validation ensuring all content respects and authentically represents Te Ao Māori perspectives.

🎯

DeepSeek Agent Network

Advanced AI orchestration with specialized agents for research, content creation, and educational optimization.

🎮

Gamified Learning

Interactive games and activities designed for neurodivergent learners with ADHD and dyslexia support.

📊

Real-time Analytics

Comprehensive learning analytics with privacy-first design and culturally-sensitive assessment frameworks.
